block.p: WAGMAN-Martin. On August 8th, 2002. Beloved husband of Adela. Devoted father of Franklin and Paige, Julie and Chip Logan, Remy Wagman & Jessica Mindick. Cherished grandfather of Jessica, Tyler and Max. Services Today, 1:30 PM at 98-60 Queens Boulevard. (at 66th Avenue) Forest Hills, 718896-5252. Interment to follow at Mount Hebron Cemetery. Gutterman Inc. Directors.
WAGMAN-Martin. Our wonderful, lovable friend. We will miss you dearly. Our hearts go out to Della, Remy, Julie and Franklin. The Bendetts & The Konigsbergs
